markdown:
**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 135 2.0 **Usage** held in 1 hand **Bulk** 1 --- A _zombie staff_ is etched with the rotting visage of an [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=722) [humanoid](/Traits.aspx?ID=628) grimacing in terror and dismay carved atop it. The staff’s [_summon undead_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1706) spells can summon only undead that have flesh and an Intelligence modifier of –4 or lower. **Activate** Cast a Spell; **Effect** You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list. If you cast _summon undead_, you can also cast [_protect companion_](/Spells.aspx?ID=975) on the resulting minion as a free action. **Craft Requirements** Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells. Zombie Staff **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 135 2.0 **Price** 330 gp **Bulk** 1 ---
  • **Cantrip** _protect companion_
  • **1st** [_necromancer’s generosity_](/Spells.aspx?ID=955), _summon undead_
  • **2nd** [_final sacrifice_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1992), _summon undead_
Zombie Staff (Greater) **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 135 2.0 **Price** 1,200 gp **Bulk** 1 ---
  • **3rd** [_bind undead_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1449), _necromancer’s generosity_, _summon undead_
  • **4th** _final sacrifice_, _summon undead_, [_talking corpse_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1712)
Zombie Staff (Major) **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 135 2.0 **Price** 5,600 gp **Bulk** 1 ---
  • **5th** _necromancer’s generosity_, _summon undead_
  • **6th** _final sacrifice_, [_necrotize_](/Spells.aspx?ID=956), _summon undead_
name: Zombie Staff
